price: 25. C’est Lui Qui accepte le repentir de Ses serviteurs, Qui pardonne les mauvaises actions et Sait ce que vous faites.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَعۡفُواْ عَنِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī yaqbalu al-tawbata ʿan ʿibādihi wayaʿfū ʿani al-sayiāti wayaʿlamu mā tafʿalūna
